name: Depression
title: Depression
description: This value set is created for MSSP ACO-38 Risk-Standardized Acute Admission Rates for Patients with Multiple Chronic Conditions measure and represents the chronic condition of Depression.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The chronic condition of Depression.),(Data Element Scope: Condition, Claim Diagnosis),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD10CM codes for the chronic condition of Depression.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)
